items.sentence: We\'re not talking about you. We\'re talking about someone else.
You would\'ve gotten away with it if Tom hadn\'t seen you do it.
Unfortunately, Tom isn\'t the one who has the final say on this.
Tom has so many friends that he can\'t remember all their names.
Tom said Mary would probably not give him permission to do that.
The easiest way to find out what you want to know is to ask Tom.
I never thought it\'d be this hard to get Tom to accept the job.
You\'re not the only one who has had problems with Tom, are you?
You\'re the only person I know besides Tom who likes to do that.
You\'re the only person that I know who has ever visited Boston.
Why did you ask us for help if you didn\'t really want our help?
Tom just told me that he doesn\'t plan to take French next year.
I want to know what\'s going to be going on here this afternoon.
Tom was a little worried about what might happen if he did that.
It\'s better to regret what you\'ve done than what you haven\'t.
Tom thinks that women always tell their best friends everything.
Tom had the painting appraised by an expert before he bought it.
I appreciate what you\'re doing, but I don\'t think it\'ll help.
I wish I could be more optimistic about what\'s going to happen.
I wasn\'t surprised when Tom told me what he was planning to do.
